course_title: Analytic Tools for Evidence Based Decision Making
course_description: Students will apply a conceptual model in designing an evaluation plan for healthcare improvement that incorporates a needs assessment, study design, sampling method, outcome measures, data collection/management plan and data analysis plan. Students will discuss outcomes and disseminating findings.
prerequisites: NRSG 715D as corequisite, NRSG 702D and NRSG 707D as prerequisites or equivalent transfer credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 4089, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: C. Abraham, Status: Open
